description.db:para: This table is used to store dynamic sockets used by opensips. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;sockets_mgm.html.

column.name: socket
column.description: The definition of the dynamic socket. Example: "udp:127.0.0.1:5090".

column.name: pool
column.description: The definition of the pool this socket belongs to. Example: "vpn". If missing, the sockets is assigned to the default pool.
